name: Elvez Control Access
author: Elvez Inc,

sections.description:
Control the access of non-logged-in users for each posts and pages.

投稿や固定ページごとにログインしていないユーザーのアクセスを制御できます。

KEY FEATURES
* Control an access per posts and pages

PREMIUM FEATURES:
* Setting redirect page
* Control access to Woocommerce pages

他にも使いやすいWordpressプラグインをご用意しています。
We provide other useful WordPress plugins.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/elvez-control-access directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Dashboard->Elvez Hide Entry Header to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.1.4

  • Fix subscription status function.

1.1.3

  • Support filter for post restrict.

1.1.2

  • Fix wp_cron error.

1.1.1

  • Update tested version.

1.1.0

  • Add subscription management.

1.0.5

  • Add option to private woocommerce.
  • Modify condition to control pages.

1.0.4

  • Update stylesheet.

1.0.3

  • Filter controled posts in home.

1.0.2

  • Fix redirect and filter problem.

1.0.1

  • Filter controled posts on list query.

1.0.0

  • Release the plugin.
